name: Technical support|Data Operations Executive (Remote)
description:
At the moment one of the one of the fastest growing startups in EU is looking for Data Operations Executive with fluent English and Russian to join their team. The position is fully remote, you can work from anywhere in Moscow time zone.

The company uses cutting edge artificial intelligence to analyse customer feedback across customer touchpoints for organisations to harness customer insights at scale, boost customer loyalty and brand advocacy. Since the company’s founding, the team have been relentlessly leveraging the best Natural Language Processing technologies for analysing customer feedback data. The company has ambitious plans to keep growing and is now looking for a Data Operations Executive to join the team and help to exceed customers’ expectations by taking the Data Operations support function to the next level.


As a Data Operations Executive, you will:
  • become a part of Engineering and Machine Learning Operations teams
  • ensure a successful integration of data from clients into the company's platform
  • help with maintaining and improving the quality and accuracy of machine learning models
  • work to streamline and develop automated processes for all data-heavy operations, using Python and SQL
What we’re looking for:
  • experience as a Support engineer, who is familiar with Python and SQL (Python here is not something you will be using every day, but a skill you will need to have. So if you have nice Python courses background, it will surely count!)
  • fluent English and Russian
  • great time management skills and the ability to work to deadlines
  • strong communication skills and a love of working collaboratively

    In return ​the company offers:
  • a competitive salary as well as the ability to share in the company’s success through options
  • great progression opportunities
  • a flexible Health & Wellness benefits budget that can be spent on health insurance, physical and mental health or other needs starting at £50pcm growing £25pcm for each year of service
  • 25 days holiday (in addition to bank holidays) + 1 day for your birthday + 1 day for every year of service up to 5 years
  • flexible working conditions and the opportunity to work from home
  • £500 (yearly) personal development budget, a progression framework, unlimited access to a fully stocked library and biweekly Breakfast and Learns

  • the main advantage that the company can offer is an amazing opportunity to join the team of passionate experts and contribute to one of the fastest growing tech companies in Europe and influence the core quality of a global product!

key_skills.name: Умение легко находить контакт с людьми
